text:
@paulsperry_ Unlike like NYC, most large cities have a full-time Mayor that doesn't take 2 hours out of his workday to go to the YMCA with an entourage.

Bill de Blasio hits public gym, flouting coronavirus rules amid city shutdown https://t.co/P4wTBpkDfk via @nypmetro
